p:
Finally, Supplementary Fig. 34 shows how the demonstrated correlations can be used to make out-of-sample predictions of outbreak size and outbreak peaks. The model is a simple linear regression using

⟨
λ
t
*
⟩
as a predictor variable trained on the first six outbreaks of the time series of dengue hospitalizations in San Juan, and tested on the last 13 outbreaks.
